document.masterDocTitle: New and little known species of ptyctimous mites (Acari, Oribatida) from Madagascar

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New and little known species of ptyctimous mites (Acari, Oribatida) from Madagascar

heading.emphasis:
Key to species of
Notophthiracarus
Ramsay, 1966
of Madagascar

subSubSection.paragraph:
*Because of incomplete data on morphological details it is difficult to include in the key
N . paulianus (
Balogh, 1962
)
, whose generic status is uncertain.

paragraph.keyLead:
1 . Surface of body reticulated...........................
N . reticularis Niedbała & Starý, 2014
(
Niedbała & Starý 2014 b
)
-. Surface of body punctate, foveolate or ornamented with ribs.................................................... 2
2 . Surface of body ornamented with longitudinal parallel ribs resembling finger dermatoglyph.......................... 3

3 . Sensilli setiform, long, thin, rough, slightly sickle-shaped; setae v’ of femora I present,,setae d forked distally..............................................................................................
N . zebrus (
Balogh, 1962
)
-. Sensilli long, bulbous or short with rounded head; setae v’ of femora I absent, setae d not forked...................... 4

4 . Sensilli short, with rounded head; formula of genital seta: 6 ( 4 + 2 ): 3 ; seta d of femora I in middle of article........................................................................
N . dactyloscopicus (Mahunka, 1978 )
(
Mahunka 1978 b
)

-. Sensilli long, bulbous in proximal part and very narrow and tapering in distal part; formula of genital setae: 5 : 4 ; setae d of femora I at distal end of article............................
N . liratus Niedbała & Starý, 2015
(
Niedbała & Starý 2015 c
)
6 . Foveolae on notogaster joined with feeble lines or ordered in irregular longitudinal furrows......................... 7

7 . Foveolae on notogaster joined with feeble lines; formula of genital setae: 6 : 3 ..........................................................................................
N . lineatus Niedbała & Starý, 2015
(
Niedbała & Starý 2015 c
)

-. Foveoles ordered in irregular longitudinal furrows; formula of genital setae: 5 : 4 ......
N . pseudosomalicus
Mahunka, 2010

9 . Notogaster with 2 longitudinal dorsal carinae framing flat median field; formula of genital setae: 4 : 5 ...............................................................................................
N . bicarinatus
Niedbała, 2001
-. Notogaster without cristae; another formula of genital setae................................................... 10

11 . Adanal setae ad 2 situated near paraxial border; setae d on femora I bifurcated distally...................................................................................
N . dispersus Niedbała & Starý, 2015
(
Niedbała & Starý 2015 b
)

-. Adanal setae ad 2 remote from paraxial border; setae d on femora I not bifurcated distally......
N . summersi
Niedbała, 2001

12 . Lamellar setae vestigial; formula of genital setae: 6 : 3 ...................................
N . procerus
Niedbała, 2001
-. Lamellar setae not vestigial; formula of genital setae: 5 : 4 ..................................................... 13

13 . Interlamellar setae long, as long as distance ro–in ; notogastral setae longer, c 1 ≈ c 1 – d 1 .............
N . echinus (
Balogh, 1962
)

-. Interlamellar setae considerably shorter than ro–in ; notogastral setae shorter, c 1 / c 1 – d 1 = 0.6 ........
N. parapaulianus
sp. nov.

14 . Notogaster with 2 dorsal, longitudinal cristae, framed flat field; prodorsum with crested prominent median crista.........................................................
N . quasisimilis Niedbała & Starý, 2015
(
Niedbała & Starý, 2015 c
)
-. Notogaster without dorsal cristae; prodorsum without crista or if exist is not crested............................... 15

15 . Adanal setae ad 2 remote anteriorly close to ad 3 setae..................................
N . inusitatus
Mahunka, 2010

16 . Notogaster setae minute ( c 1 < 1 / 4 c 1 – d 1 ); all setae of ano-adanal plate minute...................
N . rafalskii
Niedbała, 1997
-. Notogaster setae longer, at least c 1 = 1 / 2 c 1 – d 1 ); at least anal setae long........................................... 17

17 . Anal setae long, all adanal setae minute.........................................
N . parareductus (
Mahunka, 1992
)
-. Anal setae at least slightly shorter than adanal setae ad 1 and ad 2 ................................................ 18

18 . Adanal setae ad 2 thick, obtuse and bent distally...........................................
N . similis
Niedbała, 2001

19 . Setae in and le very short, needle-like, similar in length..
N . pandanensis Niedbała & Starý, 2014
(
Niedbała & Starý 2014 b
)
-. Setae in thick, stout, considerably longer than setae le ...................................................... 20

20 . Three pairs of lyrifissures ia , im , ip present; formula of genital setae: 6 : 3 ..............
N . malagasensis (
Mahunka, 2010
)
-. Two pairs of lyrifissures ia , im present; formula of genital setae: 5 : 4 ............................................ 21

subSection.paragraph: 21 . Head of sensilli with 4 spines; lamellar setae not minute or vestigial; curved setae d of femora I........................

.............................................
N . quasisomalicus Niedbała & Starý, 2014
(
Niedbała & Starý 2014 b
) -. Head of sensilli smooth or covered with some small spines; lamellar setae minute or vestigial; setae d of femora I straight 22 22 . Lamellar setae minute; notogastral setae short ( c 1 < c 1 – d 1 ); setae d of femora I slightly remote from distal end of article......

..........................................................................
N . parasomalicus
Niedbała, 2001
-. Lamellar setae vestigial; notogastral setae relatively long ( c 1 > c 1 – d 1 ); setae d of femora I at distal end....................

..........................................................................
N . parasummersi
Niedbała, 2001
23 . Interlamellar setae erect and as notogastral setae with hooked distal ends..........
N . clavifer
comb. nov. (
Mahunka, 1988
)* -. Interlamellar setae procumbent and as notogastral setae without hooked distal ends................................ 24 24 . Bothridia covered by small, triangular scales; sensilli with longer pedicel than rounded head; setae in and le spiniform......

..............................................................................
N . puylaerti
Niedbała, 2001
-. Bothridia without scales; other shape of sensilli; setae in and le filiform or rigid and rough......................... 25 25 . Setae in and le setae rigid, semi-erect, rough, all notogastral setae similar in length and shape; 2 pairs of lyrifissures ia and im

present..........................................................................
N . parilloi
Niedbała, 2001
-. Setae in and le setae filiform, attenuate, procumbent; notogastral setae different in length and shape; 4 pairs of lyrifissures ia ,

im , ip and ips present.................................................................................. 26 26 . Sensilli club-like, rounded distally; ro–ro > 1 /
2 in
–in.........
N. obliquus Niedbała & Starý, 2015
(
Niedbała & Starý 2015 c
) -. Sensilli with pointed tip; ro–ro < 1 /
4 in
–in................................................................. 27 27 . Majority of notogastral setae minute; h > h–h ; setae ad 2 lateral and anterior of anal setae...............................

....................................................
N . micidus Niedbała & Starý, 2015
(
Niedbała & Starý 2015 c
) -. Only 5 pairs of notogastral setae minute; h < h–h ; setae ad 2 lateral and between levels of anal setae......................

...............................................
N . andasibensis Niedbała & Starý, 2014
(
Niedbała & Starý 2014 b
) *described as
Phthiracarus
but clearly belongs to the
Notophthiracarus
by the arrangement of genital setae
